short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A set of simple tools to help you focus and stay productive

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ambient sound generator, water reminder and focus timer, all in a single clean extension. A free minimal tool to help you stay focussed and improve productivity while you work.
